Are we supposed to always dispose the editor first before we dispose the table?

Sending back to debug to put a fix in, otherwise the view is not going to be cleaned up properly.  Will investigate SWT discrepancy later.
Fixed in AsynchronousTableViewer - dispose the editor before the table.
